name: TopYCHackerNews(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get the top five stories from YCombinator's Hacker News forum, plus the highest rated comment on each one, updated hourly!

Save yourself one browser tab in the morning!

Although it uses the official HN API, this app is UNofficial.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
